Package index

Main Functions

Core functions for searching and downloading data

peruopen-package peruopen
peruopen: Access Peru's Open Data Portal (CKAN)
po_catalog()
Get searchable catalog of Peru open data with smart loading
po_search()
Unified search across Peru's open data catalog
po_get()
Smart getter for Peru open data
po_explore()
Interactive exploration of Peru's open data

Helper Functions

Support functions for data discovery and metadata

po_list_datasets()
List all available datasets from Peru's CKAN portal
po_list_organizations()
Get available organizations/groups from CKAN portal
po_list_resources()
List resources for a dataset
po_get_dataset_metadata()
Get detailed metadata for a dataset
po_get_resource_metadata()
Get metadata for a specific resource
po_download_resource()
Download a resource file
po_load_resource()
Load a resource directly into R
po_catalog_rebuild()
Clear cache and rebuild complete catalog with target size
po_get_complete_metadata_nested()
Get complete dataset metadata in nested list format with data cleaning
po_get_dataset_count()
Get total number of datasets
po_get_resource_url()
Get the download URL for a resource
po_get_structured_metadata()
Get detailed tabular metadata including all resources
po_search_datasets()
Search datasets with filters (FAST - using efficient API endpoint)
po_search_datasets_paginated()
Search datasets with pagination support for large result sets

Cache Management

Functions for managing cached data

cache_info()
Get cache information
clear_cache()
Clear package cache

Print Methods

Print methods for package objects

print(<po_search_result>)
Print method for po_search results
print(<po_explore_result>)
Print method for po_explore results
